title: Meta adds parental controls for AI-teen interactions
description: Meta is adding parental controls for kids' interactions with artificial intelligence chatbots — including the ability to turn off one-on-one chats with AI characters altogether — beginning early next year. But parents won't be able to turn off Meta's AI assistant, which Meta says will “will remain available to offer…
content:

title: AI Music Generator Suno in Funding Talks at $2 Billion Valuation
description: Suno Inc., a startup that generates music using artificial intelligence, is in talks to raise over $100 million at a valuation of more than $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, quadruple its previous valuation.
